mapper.select: SELECT st.company_code , st.collect_day , si.closing_price , si.collect_day , si.volume , st.views , st.score , st.sympathy , st.unsympathy FROM stock_article st JOIN stock_sise si ON st.company_code = si.company_code AND st.collect_day = si.collect_day WHERE si.company_code = #{companyCode} AND si.collect_day BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND si.closing_price > 0 AND si.volume > 0 ORDER BY si.collect_day
